title: Wriggle & Sparkle
description: Detective Lynn Seymour is a kraken who works for the Bureau of Paranormal Security and has a reputation for crankiness. So when his new partner turns out to be a good-looking, sugar-loving unicorn, he tries to be on his best behavior. If only they didn't keep running into Anderson's ex's, it would be a lot easier.
author: Megan Derr
